location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Site Plan Showing Proposed Power House & Various Government Buildings at Muscat to be fitted with Electric Lights & Fans'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on tracing linen with additions in penDimensions: 520mm x 650mm

mods.abstract: A simple street plan of the area of Muscat around the Political Agency building that shows buildings, roads and the sea wall. Buildings that were due to be fitted with electric lights and fans are shaded in pink.
